meanings.definition: Having long, unkempt hair or fur.
meanings.sent1: The dog with the shaggiest coat was always getting tangled.
meanings.sent2: The shaggiest rug in the house needed a good vacuuming.
meanings.sent3: The shaggiest sheep in the flock looked like a walking mop!
meanings.sent4: Her shaggiest thoughts were like wild, untamed ideas.
meanings.sent5: The shaggiest tree in the forest cast a shadow like a giant mop.

meanings.definition: Covered with long, coarse hair or fur.
meanings.sent1: The shaggiest bear in the woods was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The old chair had the shaggiest upholstery you've ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The shaggiest blanket in the house was so cozy and warm.
meanings.sent4: His shaggiest coat made him look like a walking furball.
meanings.sent5: The shaggiest carpet in the room felt rough underfoot.
